name: David's Run 5.6 (Demo)
description:
David's Run is a 2D platformer where you play David, the Biblical character and search the level for keys. It's designed for school aged children (about 4-7 years old). Player gets keys from answering questions in the level correctly. Answer the question by choosing the box with the correct answer on the outside. Throw stones at the enemies (currently called "Philistines") after you collect the slingshot. 

Each slingshot collected comes with 3 stones. Player can have no more than 3 slingshots at a time. Slingshots are hidden throughout the level and indicated through a "sparkling" (particle effect) in each level. 

Currently there is only 1 level, working out the details and goals of the game as I go along, so hopefully many updates to come. Oh, the Philistine throws darts that will take away a life (indicated by "hearts" in top right corner of screen). Currently this effect is disabled but will be updated in next release.

Controls:
Left/Right - move
Up/Space - Jump (Hold Space to jump higher)
S - Use slingshot
Down - Collect (hidden) item or View Question
NOTE: Turn off music by clicking green box in bottom right corner

The Philistines are after David! Can you guide him through treacherous levels  with traps and evil enemies as he searches for the golden keys? 

Please leave comments & feedback! Looking to improve and publish in Apple App Store soon!
